Text.Page:
You look ready to earn hazard pay, !

Go west and hunt the {@LinkCreature:2#32#bloated} and {@LinkCreature:2#22#lumbering sporewalkers}, and the {@LinkCreature:2#23#fiesty terrons}.

I'll pay well for any polluted seals you recover from their remains.

Keep it up, and you'll have the honor of protecting Kaiator on the argon front, .

Stand tall!
Just between you and me, <PCNAME>, if things return to normal here, it'll be a lot less interesting.
